alert.note: Alert for Davis; Morgan; Salt Lake; Summit (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 12:59PM MDT until June 03 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Southeastern Davis County in northern Utah... Southwestern Morgan County in northern Utah... Western Summit County in northern Utah... * Until 130 PM MDT * At 1258 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Salt Lake, or over Murray, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Trained spotters report periodic lowering of a funnel cloud. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Murray, Bountiful, West Jordan, Taylorsville, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Summit Park, Emigration Canyon, Millcreek, Mount Olympus, Mill Creek Canyon, East Millcreek, Canyon Rim, Cottonwood West, Salt Lake City International Airport, Sugarhouse, Parleys Summit and University Of Utah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 299 and 310. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 116 and 140. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
